name: Dragon Ball Super: Meerus, The Galactic Patrol
name_original: Dragon Ball Super: Meerus, The Galactic Patrol
description:
Dragon Ball Super: Meerus, The Galactic Patrol

CONTROLS

Mouse to press in buttons,

A and W to move

S to crounch,    S + K TO ROLL

W to jump, again to double jump

I to change between Meerus and Jaco

J to shoot, K to attack, L to blast.
